# Flutter Version Management
.fvm/

# Android local configuration (SDK path)
app/android/local.properties

# Android signing key (if exists)
app/android/key.properties

# Environment files (if exists)
.env
.env.local
.env.development
.env.production

# VS Code settings (optional)
.vscode/settings.json
.vscode/launch.json

# IDE settings
.idea/

# Flutter plugins (auto-generated but needed for initial setup)
.flutter-plugins
.flutter-plugins-dependencies

# Additional environment files
.env.dev
.env.stag
.env.prod
